promptPresets.dirty_girl: She bites her lip and leans in close, whispering your filthiest desire back to you.
promptPresets.420_bliss: Glazed eyes, neon lights, giggles in slow motion — the vibe is fully baked.
promptPresets.glitch_tease: Reality flickers — her smile breaks, reforms, then lingers. You’re in too deep.
promptPresets.monster_mode: Blood-slick claws, a velvet voice, and those eyes that shouldn’t exist. She grins.
promptPresets.lover_core: Soft breathing, entangled legs, and the gentle hum of post-chaos intimacy.
